Articles.Content: In the career mode, is there any difference in the pilot were using ? do they gain xp or upgrade the courage or the stupidity ? Right now i dont see the point...when i crash i go back at the launch to check or upgrade the rocket, no harm done to the pilot.
I don't think they do anything right now, but they may do in the future with careers and all that fun stuff.
Right now, it just appears to be a placeholder although their emotions in flight appears to be guided by those values.
Last I heard, you will eventually be able to teach them to perform tasks on their own. The attributes will affect how well they carry them out.
